tool_description: Extracts all bibliography entries from manuscript text by identifying reference sections and parsing individual citations.

manuscript_text.description: Full manuscript text containing bibliography section

section_headers.description: Custom section headers that indicate bibliography sections

include_footnotes.description: Whether to include footnote citations in extraction

error_messages: No bibliography section found: Manuscript does not contain identifiable reference sections.
Empty manuscript text: Provide non-empty manuscript content.
Invalid section headers: Section headers must be non-empty strings.
Extraction failed: Unable to parse bibliography entries from the identified sections.
usage: Input complete manuscript text to automatically locate and extract all bibliography entries. Customize section headers if using non-standard reference section names.

total_entries.description: Total number of extracted bibliography entries

entries.description: Individual bibliography entries as text strings

section_location.description: Location information of the identified bibliography section
